Html:
Hi,

I have tried to compile the source 2.0 and 3.0 with mono on macos but it does not work. Not sure if I am doing this right. Does anybody done this before or are the dll files available for this platform somewhere ?

with Version 2.0

>xbuild QuickGraph.csproj

I get the following error message,
 Algorithms/EulerianTrailAlgorithm.cs(216,46):   error CS0121:  The call is ambiguous between the following methods or properties: `QuickGraph.TraversalHelper.GetFirstVertex<TVertex,TEdge>(QuickGraph.IVertexListGraph<TVertex,TEdge>)' and `QuickGraph.TraversalHelper.GetFirstVertex<TVertex,TEdge>(QuickGraph.IUndirectedGraph<TVertex,TEdge>)'

with Version 3.0

>xbuild QuickGraph.csproj

I get the following error message,
Algorithms/Cliques/BronKerboshMaximumCliqueAlgorithm.cs(34,17):   error CS0168:  The variable `X' is declared but never used
